pullRequest.title: 297/1248: Prisoner Capture Consolidation
pullRequest.bodyText: This fixes #297 and fixes #1248 by implementing a prisoner capture status enum. I also used the time to enable further customization and modularization of the AtB Prisoner System, so that you can largely use it without playing AtB.

nodes.bodyText: This seems like if you're using the CamOps unit rating, then it'll always return a rating C, which may not be the desired effect.

commit.message: Updating tool tip for Taharqa prisoner capture method
